recipe_overview.description: Deploys the Open WebUI service using Docker, providing a user-friendly interface for interacting with the Ollama backend. This is a default component.
deliverables: A running Open WebUI Docker container.
A Docker Compose file that links Open WebUI to the Ollama service.
A web interface accessible to the user in their browser.

tasks.title: Deploy Open WebUI Container
tasks.description: Create and configure a docker-compose.yml file to run the official Open WebUI image and connect it to the Ollama container.
acceptance_criteria: The open-webui.yml Docker Compose file is created.
The Open WebUI container starts and successfully connects to the Ollama backend.
The web interface is accessible on its specified port (e.g., 8080).
